title: Knowing releases
context: ยง128D-10 Knowing releases. Any person who knowingly releases a hazardous substance into the environment in an amount above the reportable quantity established in the rules (other than a permitted release pursuant to and in accord with a federal, state, or county permit), shall be subject to prosecution for a class C felony or shall be punished by a civil penalty of not more than $100,000 per day of violation. [L 1990, c 298, pt of ยง17; am L 1991, c 280, ยง11]
